page.title: 18LOCAL NEWSPAPER
page.content: We interviewed the{chief reporter}of the Stourport News.She told us that there is no typical day being a {journalist.}The day starts with the opening of the post to see what is to happen that day.A diary is also used for this purpose.After this each journalist is given their assignment for the day,their time being split between collecting and writing stories.Their are different levels of journalists from trainees to the editor who controls the paper.The paper is{distributed free of charge throughout Stourport,Bewdley, Kidderminster and the surrounding villages.Working on the newspaper are 5 journalists,a chief reporter,deputy editor and editor.
